__e: You don't trust the loyalty of the men following you into battle?
The most important factor in any relationship is the woman's fidelity.
You're damn right, and I hope his execution makes it clear once and for all where people's allegiances need to lie.
Loyalty and courage still exist in this world.
Why are they loyal to her and not me?
They steal away your loyalty and heart from those you love.
Now I say give me the girl I love, and I will swear eternal constancy to her, through summer, winter, youth and age.
You can swear your allegiance to me now... or you can die.
Come now, pledge your loyalty to me.
Their loyalty is absolute, yet they wonder.
Each one of you must obey my commands, or each one of you must die.
It wasn't his heart. He died of loyalty to an ideal.
Now that the wars are over, someone who is worthy of our loyalty has at last appeared.
I'll trade my life to protect my Lord.
I have stayed married to a woman I don't love, because I made a vow to God.
I said I'd be faithful to him, I know he's honest.
